component.text: Ajuste de la interfaz Serial 0/0/1 del R1
Ajuste del ancho de banda de las interfaces

component.feedback: *** Debe introducir el comando exacto y completo.***
component.existingcommands:
• Configure el ancho de banda para la interfaz serial 0/0/1 en 1024.
  • Vuelva al modo EXEC privilegiado.

command.deviceresponse:
R2#
*Mar 27 10:30:34.375: %SYS-5-CONFIG_I: Configured from console by console
command.instruction: Introduzca el comando “show interfaces” para serial 0/0/1 a fin de verificar la configuración del ancho de banda.

command.deviceresponse:
Serial0/0/1 is up, line protocol is up
Hardware is WIC MBRD Serial
Description: Link to R3
Internet address is 192.168.10.9/30
MTU 1500 bytes, BW 1024 Kbit/sec, DLY 20000 usec,
reliability 255/255, txload 1/255, rxload 1/255
Encapsulation HDLC, loopback not set
Keepalive set (10 sec)
Last input 00:00:01, output 00:00:05, output hang never
Last clearing of "show interface" counters never
Input queue: 0/75/0/0 (size/max/drops/flushes); Total output drops: 0
Queueing strategy: fifo
Output queue: 0/40 (size/max)
5 minute input rate 0 bits/sec, 0 packets/sec
5 minute output rate 0 bits/sec, 0 packets/sec
2134 packets input, 167658 bytes, 0 no buffer
Received 1115 broadcasts (0 IP multicasts)
0 runts, 0 giants, 0 throttles
0 input errors, 0 CRC, 0 frame, 0 overrun, 0 ignored, 0 abort
2132 packets output, 166968 bytes, 0 underruns
0 output errors, 0 collisions, 3 interface resets
0 unknown protocol drops
0 output buffer failures, 0 output buffers swapped out
2 carrier transitions
DCD=up DSR=up DTR=up RTS=up CTS=up

R2#
command.instruction: Muestre el costo para serial 0/0/0 con el comando “show ip ospf interface”.

command.deviceresponse:
Serial0/0/0 is up, line protocol is up
Internet Address 172.16.3.2/30, Area 0, Attached via Network Statement
Process ID 10, Router ID 2.2.2.2, Network Type POINT_TO_POINT, Cost: 647
Topology-MTID Cost Disabled Shutdown Topology Name
0 647 no no Base
Transmit Delay is 1 sec, State POINT_TO_POINT
Timer intervals configured, Hello 10, Dead 40, Wait 40, Retransmit 5
oob-resync timeout 40
Hello due in 00:00:07
Supports Link-local Signaling (LLS)
Cisco NSF helper support enabled
IETF NSF helper support enabled
Index 2/2, flood queue length 0
Next 0x0(0)/0x0(0)
Last flood scan length is 1, maximum is 1
Last flood scan time is 0 msec, maximum is 0 msec
Neighbor Count is 1, Adjacent neighbor count is 1
Adjacent with neighbor 1.1.1.1
Suppress hello for 0 neighbor(s)
R2#
command.instruction:
Ahora configure el R3.
  • Configure el ancho de banda de la interfaz serial 0/0/0 en 64.
  • Configure el ancho de banda de la interfaz serial 0/0/1 en 1024.
  • Vuelva al modo EXEC privilegiado.

command.deviceresponse:
R3#
*Mar 27 10:32:53.775: %SYS-5-CONFIG_I: Configured from console by console
R3#
command.instruction:
• Filtre el resultado de show interfaces para serial 0/0/0 a fin de que incluya solo las líneas con BW.
  • Filtre el resultado de show interfaces para serial 0/0/1 a fin de que incluya solo las líneas con BW.
  • Filtre el resultado de show ip ospf interface para serial 0/0/0 a fin de que incluya las líneas con “Cost:”.
  • Filtre el resultado de show ip ospf interface para serial 0/0/1 a fin de que incluya las líneas con “Cost:”.

command.deviceresponse:
MTU 1500 bytes, BW 64 Kbit/sec, DLY 20000 usec,
R3#

MTU 1500 bytes, BW 1024 Kbit/sec, DLY 20000 usec,
R3#

command.correctresponse: show ip ospf interface serial 0/0/0 | include Cost:
command.deviceresponse:
Process ID 10, Router ID 3.3.3.3, Network Type POINT_TO_POINT, Cost: 15625
R3#

command.correctresponse: show ip ospf interface serial 0/0/1 | include Cost:
command.deviceresponse:
Process ID 10, Router ID 3.3.3.3, Network Type POINT_TO_POINT, Cost: 976
R3#
command.instruction: Ajustó correctamente el ancho de banda de las interfaces en el R2 y el R3.
